message.body: Hey, actually i have a planning from 6-8pm on the 29th :( i'm sry to be an inconvenience :/ when i signed up i told them i have evening mtgs a lot
S'no prob, me n Marija are messing up the next two weeks schedule :-). I'll email you both tomorrow and we'll work something out. What's yr email?
Next Tuesday, 7:30! Sorry this took so long, they were out all week for the holiday I think
Hey, I won't be able to make Tuesday's class. I just left a message at the school and told them to hold the class anyway and I'd figure something out
Sorry I could have sworn I replied. Yes I'll be there tomorrow
(1/2)In the time since our last class I haven't had much opportunity to practice, so I think I'd be holding the group back. For now I'm back in my first group.
